name: DETRIMENTAL PRINCIPLES: A Space Funeral Story
name_original: DETRIMENTAL PRINCIPLES: A Space Funeral Story
description:
It is highly recommended that you play Space Funeral and Space Funeral: Earth Birth first, but not required.

Note: Some sprites in this game are borrowed from thecatamites, Duckstapler, and Oskodos.

Story:

DETRIMENTAL PRINCIPLES: A Space Funeral Story tells the tale of DILBERT and APAKADO. Two abominations of science who are set to help revive PHILLIP and LEG HORSE into the world of SPACE FUNERAL in order to kill them for leaving the world behind. The story takes place between SPACE FUNERAL and SPACE FUNERAL: EARTH BIRTH.

Features:

  • 14 new areas to explore.
  • 29 new enemies to battle.
  • Goop.
  • Mingo The Beetle.
  • Wizards.
  • Creatures.
  • Much more. . .

FAQ

How do I play the game?

Arrow keys walk, Z interacts, X opens menu.

Thanks.

No problem.
